DataElement.preferredName: Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale - Short Form Psychological Symptom Subscale Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calculated numeric value resulting from the average of the frequency, severity and distress associated with 6 prevalent psychological symptoms (worrying, feeling sad, feeling nervous, difficulty sleeping, feeling irritable and difficulty concentrating) used in measuring the effects of psychological symptoms, using the Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale - Short Form questionnaire.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale - Short Form Psychological Symptom Subscale Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An abbreviated version of the Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale designed to evaluate the burden of physical and psychological symptoms in advanced cancer patients. It evaluates 24 symptoms for their prevalence, characteristics, and associated distress._A subscale of the Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale that is the average of the frequency, severity, and distress associated with worrying, feeling sad, feeling nervous, difficulty sleeping, feeling irritable, and difficulty concentrating._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale - Short Form
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An abbreviated version of the Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale designed to evaluate the burden of physical and psychological symptoms in advanced cancer patients. It evaluates 24 symptoms for their prevalence, characteristics, and associated distress.
